summary.value: A colorful and tenacious flower, favored by an ancient dynasty.

effects.effect:
You are immune to shaken and weak.

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.zSg3jNvLG1FtqOAz e:eot i:2 t:source]{Shaken Immunity} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.azrYbcObDaVQ5GBG e:eot i:2 t:source]{Weak Immunity}

You treat your Might and Willpower as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.hX70STpGG5fgAAkp e:eot i:1 t:source]{MIG Up} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.nXxz7GyqeIGtQpMG e:eot i:1 t:source]{WLP Up}

You and every ally you can see treat your Might and Willpower as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).

Targets Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.hX70STpGG5fgAAkp e:eot i:1 t:source]{MIG Up} and @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.nXxz7GyqeIGtQpMG e:eot i:1 t:source]{WLP Up}
